tool_description: Catalogs and organizes rooms and areas in a home with their specific characteristics, size, and cleaning requirements.

room_name.description: Name of the room or area

room_type.description: Category of room (bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living_room, office, garage, outdoor)

square_footage.description: Size of room in square feet

special_features.description: Special elements requiring specific cleaning (hardwood, carpet, tile, appliances, windows)

error_messages: Invalid room_type: Must be one of [bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, living_room, office, garage, outdoor]
Invalid traffic_level: Must be one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid square_footage: Must be a positive number if provided
Empty room_name: Room name cannot be empty or whitespace only
usage: Add rooms one by one with their characteristics. Use this tool first to establish the foundation for all cleaning schedules.

recommended_frequency.description: Suggested cleaning frequency based on room type and traffic
